watermark.title: Custom Logo
watermark.description: Set up your brand on photos

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Configure fields for each property type

facebook.title: Facebook
facebook.publishSuccessDesc: Your property is now on Facebook

language.title: Language / Idioma
language.infoDescription: This will be the language in which the entire application is displayed. Texts, menus and messages will appear in the selected language.
language.note1: This setting only affects the app interface
language.note2: You can change the language at any time
language.note3: The language of your properties is configured separately
language.alreadySelected: This is already your selected language

alerts.configureUsername: ‚ö†Ô∏è First set up your username in your profile

currency.title: Default Currency
currency.infoDescription: This will be the currency that appears preselected when you create new properties. You can change it at any time for each individual property.
currency.note1: This setting only affects new properties
currency.note2: Existing properties keep their original currency
currency.note3: You can change the currency when creating or editing each property
currency.note4: There is no automatic price conversion
currency.alreadyDefault: This is already your default currency

watermark.title: Logo
watermark.infoTip: Upload a logo to appear automatically on all your property photos. If you don't upload a logo, the text "Flow Estate AI" will be used.
watermark.defaultText: The text "FlowEstate AI" will be used by default
watermark.recFormat: Format: PNG (with transparent background) or JPG
watermark.positionNote: The text "FlowEstate AI" always appears in the bottom left
watermark.previewNote: The logo will be automatically applied to all photos you upload
watermark.confirmDelete: Delete custom logo? Default text will be used.
watermark.onlyImages: Only PNG or JPG images are allowed.

facebook.title: Facebook
facebook.importantNote: If you want to use this feature, please contact the project administrators.
facebook.step2: Click the Facebook button on any property
facebook.step3: Your property will be published automatically!
facebook.notConnectedDesc: Connect your Facebook page to start publishing
facebook.req1: Have a Facebook Page (not a personal profile)
facebook.req2: Be an administrator of the page
facebook.aiToggleDesc: The first image will be converted into a professional flyer with your brand
facebook.faqQ1: What type of account do I need?
facebook.faqA1: You need a Facebook Page, not a personal profile. Pages are for businesses and professionals.
facebook.faqQ2: Is it safe to connect my page?
facebook.faqA2: Yes, we only request permissions to publish. We cannot see private messages or personal information.
facebook.faqA3: Yes, disconnect the current one and connect another page whenever you want.
facebook.errorNoPages: You don't have Facebook pages. Create a page first.
facebook.errorDenied: Access denied. Please accept the permissions.
facebook.allowPopups: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please allow pop-ups to connect with Facebook

analytics.title: My Business
analytics.noDataDesc: Create your first property to see your analytics
analytics.comingSoon: Coming soon: Most viewed properties ranking
analytics.unlockViews: Unlock view metrics by sharing your properties more

digitalCard.title: Digital Card
digitalCard.name: Name
digitalCard.bioPlaceholder: Ex: Real estate agent with 10 years of experience in Guanacaste...
digitalCard.bilingualNote: Fill these fields to make your card available in English
digitalCard.bioEnglishPlaceholder: Ex: Real estate agent with 10 years of experience in Guanacaste...

agentCard.notConfigured: This agent hasn't set up their digital card yet
agentCard.createdWith: Created with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Flow Estate AI
agentCard.whatsappMessage: Hello {name}, I saw your digital card and would like to contact you

createProperty.introText: Complete the following steps to generate your property in seconds
createProperty.needVoice: You need to record the voice description
createProperty.currencyTip: You can change your default currency in Settings
createProperty.propertyLanguageTip: This will be the language for the description and how it appears in the portfolio
createProperty.customFieldsHint: Fields to mention in your recording
createProperty.customFieldsHintDesc: Mention these details so the AI can complete them automatically
createProperty.noCustomFields: No custom fields for this combination
createProperty.voiceDescription: Describe the property: location, price, special features
createProperty.changeConfigTip: To change, you must regenerate the listing
createProperty.title: Title
createProperty.countryDetected: Country automatically detected by your location. Change it if the property is in another country.
createProperty.selectCountry: Select the country before pasting the Plus Code
createProperty.emptyFieldsTip: You can publish anyway, but we recommend filling them for better presentation
createProperty.locationRequired: You must configure the location on the map
createProperty.plusCodeRequired: Plus Code was not generated correctly

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.tip: Create custom fields for each property type. These fields will appear when creating/editing properties of that type.
customFields.bilingualTip: Enter the name in both languages so it displays correctly according to the property language
customFields.createFirst: Create your first field to start

voiceRecorder.instructionsText: Describe the property with all details: location also remember to mention the custom fields if needed and any relevant information. Speak clearly and in detail so the AI can generate the best possible description.
voiceRecorder.microphoneError: Could not access microphone. Check permissions.
